mapper.select: SELECT AJ.AJBH, A.S_CODE AS CODE, A.S_FULL_NAME AS FULL_NAME, T.S_CAPTION AS CAPTION, A.S_REASON AS REASON, p.S_NAME as NAME, A.S_DEPT AS DEPT, A.S_INQUEST_DEPT_CAPTION AS INQUEST_DEPT_CAPTION, A.DT_CREATE_TIME AS DT_CREATE_TIME, u.DT_START_USE_TIME as DT_START_USE_TIME, u.DT_END_USE_TIME as DT_END_USE_TIME, P.S_CREDENTIALS_NUM, p.S_DOMICILE, P.I_AGE AS AGE, CS.S_CAPTION AS SEX, D.S_CAPTION AS NATION, P.DT_BIRTHDAY AS BIRTHDAY FROM TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE A LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE_TYPE T ON A.I_TYPE_ID = T.I_ID LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_STANDBOOK_USER U ON A.S_CODE = U.S_TABULATE_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TAB_PERSON P ON P.S_ID = U.S_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN AJ_JBXX AJ ON AJ.BARZJHM = P.S_CREDENTIALS_NUM LEFT JOIN TAB_GA_CODE_SEX CS ON CS.I_ID = P.I_SEX LEFT JOIN TAB_GA_CODE_NATION D ON D.S_ID = P.S_NATION WHERE A.S_FULL_NAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.DT_CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT AJ.AJBH, A.S_CODE AS CODE, A.S_FULL_NAME AS FULL_NAME, T.S_CAPTION AS CAPTION, A.S_REASON AS REASON, p.S_NAME as NAME, A.S_DEPT AS DEPT, A.S_INQUEST_DEPT_CAPTION AS INQUEST_DEPT_CAPTION, A.DT_CREATE_TIME AS DT_CREATE_TIME, u.DT_START_USE_TIME as DT_START_USE_TIME, u.DT_END_USE_TIME as DT_END_USE_TIME FROM TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE A LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE_TYPE T ON A.I_TYPE_ID = T.I_ID LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_STANDBOOK_USER U ON A.S_CODE = U.S_TABULATE_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TAB_PERSON P ON P.S_ID = U.S_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN AJ_JBXX AJ ON AJ.BARZJHM = P.S_CREDENTIALS_NUM WHERE A.S_FULL_NAME IS NOT NULL AND AJ.AJBH IS NOT NULL
AND TO_CHAR(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-mm-dd') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-mm-dd') as time from dual)
AND TO_CHAR(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-mm') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-mm') as time from dual)
AND TO_CHAR(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') as time from dual)
AND A.S_FULL_NAME LIKE '%${fullName}%'
AND TO_DATE(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= TO_DATE(#{dtStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND TO_DATE(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= TO_DATE(#{dtEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY A.DT_CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT '' as AJBH, A.S_CODE AS CODE, A.S_FULL_NAME AS FULL_NAME, T.S_CAPTION AS CAPTION, A.S_REASON AS REASON, p.S_NAME as NAME, A.S_DEPT AS DEPT, A.S_INQUEST_DEPT_CAPTION AS INQUEST_DEPT_CAPTION, A.DT_CREATE_TIME AS DT_CREATE_TIME, u.DT_START_USE_TIME as DT_START_USE_TIME, u.DT_END_USE_TIME as DT_END_USE_TIME FROM TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE A LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE_TYPE T ON A.I_TYPE_ID = T.I_ID LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_STANDBOOK_USER U ON A.S_CODE = U.S_TABULATE_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TAB_PERSON P ON P.S_ID = U.S_PERSON_ID WHERE A.S_FULL_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.S_CREDENTIALS_NUM NOT IN (SELECT AJ.BARZJHM FROM AJ_JBXX AJ WHERE AJ.BARZJHM IS NOT NULL) OR P.S_CREDENTIALS_NUM IS NULL
AND TO_CHAR(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-mm-dd') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-mm-dd') as time from dual)
AND TO_CHAR(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-mm') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-mm') as time from dual)
AND TO_CHAR(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') as time from dual)
AND A.S_FULL_NAME LIKE '%${fullName}%'
AND TO_DATE(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= TO_DATE(#{dtStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND TO_DATE(A.DT_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= TO_DATE(#{dtEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY A.DT_CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT B.S_ID AS ID, B.S_INQUEST_ARCHIVE_ID AS INQUEST_ARCHIVE_ID, B.S_CAPTION AS CAPTION, B.I_EVIDENCE_TYPE_ID AS EVIDENCE_TYPE_ID, B.I_EVIDENCE_STATUS_ID AS EVIDENCE_STATUS_ID, B.S_DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, B.S_OTHER_VIEWS AS OTHER_VIEWS, B.DT_UPLOAD AS DT_UPLOAD, B.DT_MODIFY AS DT_MODIFY, B.S_PATH AS PATH, B.S_MODIFY_USER_ID AS MODIFY_USER_ID, B.S_REMARK AS REMARK, B.I_FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE FROM TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE A LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE_EVIDENCE B ON A.S_ID = B.S_INQUEST_ARCHIVE_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.S_CODE = #{code}

SELECT G.S_ID as id, G.S_NUMBER as snumber, G.I_COUNT as count, G.S_UNIT as unit, G.S_PROTECT_MEASURE as protectMeasure, G.S_CABINET_NUM as cabinetNum, G.S_REMARK as remark, G.S_STANDBOOK_USER_ID as standbookUserId, G.S_CAPTURE as capture, G.S_CAPTION as caption, G.I_INVLOVED as invloved, G.I_GOODS_TYPE_ID as goodsTypeId, G.S_LOCKER_NUMBER as lockerNumber, G.S_DESCRIPTION as description, G.I_GOODS_STATUS as goodsStatus, G.I_RECEIVE_MODE_TYPE as receiveModeType, G.S_ENTRUST_PERSON as entrustPerson, G.DT_RECEIVE_TIME as receiveTime FROM TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE A LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_STANDBOOK_USER U ON A.S_CODE = U.S_TABULATE_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_FOLLOW_GOODS_INFO G ON U.S_ID = G.S_STANDBOOK_USER_ID where 1=1
AND A.S_code = #{code}

SELECT I.S_ID, P.S_NAME AS NAME,
'' AS POLICE,
( SELECT LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(U.S_CAPTION), ',')WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY U.S_CAPTION) AS POLICE_NAME FROM TAB_INQUEST_STANDBOOK_POLICE SP LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_STANDBOOK_USER SU ON SU.S_ID = SP.S_STANDBOOK_ID LEFT JOIN TAB_USER U ON SP.S_USER_ID = U.S_ID WHERE SU.S_TABULATE_NUMBER = #{code} GROUP BY SP.S_STANDBOOK_ID ) POLICE,
I.S_LOCATION, I.S_USER_NAME, I.DT_START, I.DT_END FROM TAB_INQUEST_ARCHIVE A LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST_STANDBOOK_USER U ON A.S_CODE = U.S_TABULATE_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TAB_INQUEST I ON I.S_STANDBOOK_ID = U.S_ID LEFT JOIN TAB_PERSON P ON P.S_ID = U.S_PERSON_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.S_CODE = #{code}
ORDER BY I.DT_START ASC

SELECT A.S_CODE AS CODE, A.S_FULL_NAME AS FULLNAME, A.S_TYPE AS TYPE, A.S_NAME AS NAME , A.S_DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , A.S_POLICE AS POLICE, A.S_PHONE_NUM AS PHONENUM, A.I_COMPULSORY_MEASURES AS COMPULSORYMEASURES, A.DT_START AS DTSTART, A.DT_END AS DTEND, A.I_SUE AS SUE, A.S_NOTE AS NOTE, A.I_OPERATION AS OPERATION FROM TAB_ARCHIVE_EXECUTION A WHERE A.S_FULL_NAME IS NOT NULL

select A.START_USE_ALL_COUNT as STARTUSEALLCOUNT,B.START_USE_COUNT as STARTUSECOUNT,C.END_USE_COUNT as ENDUSECOUNT from
(select count(*) as START_USE_ALL_COUNT from tab_inquest_standbook_user) A,
(select count(*) as START_USE_COUNT from tab_inquest_standbook_user where 1=1
and TO_CHAR(DT_START_USE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-mm-dd') as time from dual)
AND TO_CHAR(DT_START_USE_TIME,'iw')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'iw') AND TO_CHAR(DT_START_USE_TIME,'YY')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY')
AND TO_CHAR(DT_START_USE_TIME,'YYYY-mm') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-mm') as time from dual)
AND TO_CHAR(DT_START_USE_TIME,'YYYY') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') as time from dual)
AND TO_DATE(DT_START_USE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') between TO_DATE(#{dtStart},'YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_DATE(#{dtEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD')
) B,
(select count(*) END_USE_COUNT from tab_inquest_standbook_user where 1=1
and TO_CHAR(DT_END_USE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-mm-dd') as time from dual)
AND TO_CHAR(DT_END_USE_TIME,'iw')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'iw') AND TO_CHAR(DT_END_USE_TIME,'YY')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY')
AND TO_CHAR(DT_END_USE_TIME,'YYYY-mm') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-mm') as time from dual)
AND TO_CHAR(DT_END_USE_TIME,'YYYY') = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') as time from dual)
AND TO_DATE(DT_END_USE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') between TO_DATE(#{dtStart},'YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_DATE(#{dtEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD')
) C
